amendatorysection.catchline: Plan of reorganization; two or more districts; indebtedness.
amendatorysection.para: Whenever two or more school districts are involved in a reorganization plan, the old districts shall continue to be responsible for any indebtedness incurred before the reorganization takes place unless a different arrangement is included in the plan voted upon by the people. Bonded indebtedness incurred for high school facilities prior to the adoption of any affiliation plan shall remain the obligation of the high school district unless otherwise specified in the petitions.
